author: Rev says desu
description:
Disney recently released the trailer for the upcoming "Lilo & Stitch" live action movie. However, based on casting choices for characters like Nani, Twitter users are seething.
Lilo & Stitch live action trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWqJifMMgZE

title: Twitter Freaks BLAST 'Lilo & Stitch' Trailer For "White-Washing" And "Transphobia"
